File libsrc/libmath/nicex.c

Public Functions

nicex 
 void nicex(double ax1,
            double ax2,
            int minlb,
            int maxlb,
            int *nlab,
            double *x,
            int *ndigit,
            int *ndeci)
Return 'nice' evenly spaced numbers. Return evenly spaced numbers between ax1 and ax2 for axis labeling, or contour values.

Parameters:
ax1 - range limit.
ax2 - range limit. ax2 can be greater than or less than ax1.
minlb - the minimum number of numbers returned.
maxlb - the maximum number of numbers returned.
nlab - (output) the number of numbers returned.
x - (output) the evenly spaced numbers.
ndigit - (output) the total number of digits needed to distinguish each label x[].
ndeci - (output) the number digits to the right of the decimal needed to distinguish each label x[].
